I'm not sure who I dislike more, the cruel husband who'd allow his brother to be chained to a bed for an extended period of time to save his job and doesn't care about, and actually wants his wife to have an affair or the sister-in-law who is willing to have sex with her brother while he's chained, treats him like a baby, doesn't provide any encouragement towards him being successful, and would choose to marry someone she doesn't like just to fulfill the brother-in-law's childhood wish, this is why I don't like any netorare.
I genuinely have no idea what to make of this, not sure if I like it or hate it.
EDIT:  Ok. The "mommy" play is downright atrocious and a boner-killer.
